ReferenceDocuments.name: Were any medical conditions o
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were any medical conditions or events reported?; Has the subject had any medical conditions or events?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH PROMPT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Any Medical History

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology
ReferenceDocuments.description: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate if the subject experienced any medical conditions or events. If yes, include the appropriate details where indicated on the CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: N/A
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does not map to an SDTMIG variable. The SDTM Annotated CRF is annotated to indicate that this field is NOT SUBMITTED.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The intent/purpose of collecting this field is to help with data cleaning and monitoring. It provides verification if all other fields on the CRF were deliberately left blank.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Any Baseline Symptoms

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the past 7 days, has the patient experienced any

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the past 7 days, has the patient experienced any symptoms due to COVID-19?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have a pre-existing condition or baseline AE?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 100
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have any pre-existing conditions or baseline AEs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had COVID-19 symptoms in 2 weeks prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have pre-existing conditions at the indicated time point?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had COVID-19 in the past that, in the opinion of the treating physician, had left the patient in a compromised taste, which has not resolved at the time of registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any PAST or CURRENT medical conditions/major medical problems?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_02
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were any new medical conditions or events reported this reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: During this reporting period, has the patient had symptoms suspicious of SARS CoV-2 infection or exposure?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was splenomegaly present?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was hepatomegaly present?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Mediastinal mass:

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have optic pathway gliomas?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have Neuroblastoma?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have Osteosarcoma?
